summary: This document is an email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Harry Beller regarding the transfer of securities related to Southern Financial and Haze Trust. It discusses the positions to be transferred and the timeline for the transfer process.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, involved in the correspondence regarding the transfer of securities.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is the sender of the email, providing information about the securities transfer process.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby and Harry Beller are both associated with Deutsche Bank, indicating a professional relationship.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, USA, 10154-0004
keyFacts: The document is an email dated September 18, 2013.
Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
Harry Beller is involved in the securities transfer process.
The email discusses the transfer of securities related to Southern Financial and Haze Trust.
Attachments mentioned in the email were deleted by Seldon Clarke.
